name: 柯萊恩
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
COURSE SCHEDULE
All assignments are due next class session unless otherwise indicated.  For complete details of formal writing assignments and informal writing tasks (journal entries), please see appropriate writing assignment or journal entry schedule.
February 27	Introduction/ ASSIGNMENT ( Journal Entry #1): Selecting an Area of Interest

March 6		MLA Format/ JE#1 Due/ ASSIGNMENT: Compose WA#1: Research Proposal

March 13	DRAFT WA#1 DUE (with three extra copies)

March 20	FINAL DRAFT WA#1 DUE/ ASSIGNMENT (JE#2): Research Question and Statement of Methodology

March 27	JE#2 Due/ ASSIGNMENT: Compose WA#2:  Review of the Secondary Literature

April 10		Draft WA#2 (with three extra copies) Due

April 17		FINAL DRAFT WA#2 DUE/ASSIGNMENT (JE#3): Locating a Primary Source

April 24	JE#3 Due/ ASSIGNMENT: Compose WA#3: Comparing Two Sources

May 1	Discussion/ Individual Conferences

May 8		DRAFT WA#3 (with three extra copies) DUE/Peer Evaluation

May 15		FINAL DRAFT WA#3 DUE/ ASSIGNMENT (JE#4):What Have You Learned So Far?
 
May 22		JE#4 Due/ ASSIGNMENT: Prepare for Group Presentations

May 29		Group Presentations

June 3		Group Presentations  ASSIGNMENT:  Compose WA#4: Research Report

June 10		DRAFT (WITH THREE EXTRA COPIES) OF FINAL PAPER DUE

FINAL PAPER DUE NOON JUNE 17
scorePolicy:
GRADING
25%	Papers 1-3				25%	Quizzes and Journals 
25%	Final Paper				25%	Participation and Presentation
